value.title: Is Power BI Certification Worth It? ðŸ’²ðŸ’²ðŸ’² (Exam DA-100 / Exam 70-778 / Certified Data Analystâ€¦)
value.excerpt: You may be considering taking the Microsoft Power BI Certification Examsâ€¦but should you? But before you put in the time, effort and money $$$...shouldn't you ask yourself "Is Power BI Certification Even Worth It?"  I am going to tell you 3 reasons you should and 3 reasons you shouldn't take these exams.

value.title: Relationship in Power BI with Multiple Columns
value.excerpt: You can create relationships in Power BI between tables. Relationships are useful for some functions to work across multiple tables and produce the result. Relationship between tables also makes visualization and report elements more efficient, because the result of selection in one chart can affect

value.title: Building relationships between tables when both have duplicates
value.excerpt: PowerPivot and Power BI Desktop only allow the creation of relationships between tables when one of columns forming the relationship does not have duplicate values.  In order to relate these two tables to one another, what we need is a third table with all distinct values from both tables. In this tutorial

value.title: Avoid the full refresh with Incremental Refresh in Power BI (Premium)
value.excerpt: Is the full refresh of Incremental Refresh taking a long time? Or, even timing out? Patrick shows you how you can avoid the full refresh and refresh each partition individually when using Power BI Premium!  Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKVrl0ec6uE

value.title: Help your Power BI report users with an Information Panel
value.excerpt: Do your Power BI users understand your report? Chances are, at least not all of it. Help them out with an information panel to help describe the report and understand all of the capabilities. Adam walks you through how to do it in Power BI Desktop!  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. topItems.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)
